title: attaruNam
sahitya:
attaruNam abhayam koDut-tANDaruLvAi en ammai appA


anupallavi

  bhaktha paripAlakanE parandAmanE pArkaDalil paLLi koNDa padmanAbhanE irangi


caraNam    uttamap-piravi aLittAi UnamillAda uDalum arivum koDuttAi
 eLLattanaiyum nanriyillEnE paranda aruL attanaiyum nAn marandEnE
bhaktiyum illaiyE siddha suktiyum illAk-koDiya
pAviyAnAlum uDal viTTAvi piriya tudikkum
